name: bag boy (trixy devs)
description:
This game was made for the 8 bits mundane jam

credits:

made by: trixyDevs (dragonier135)

original music from: TiHKAL MooN DWeLLeR (I just found it on youtube okay?)

font: GUERRILLA, by: Carlos Zubia

controls:

click and drag mouse to move objects, scroll wheel to move them on the z axis.

description: your a person who is turning into a zombie and you have to get to the doctor. but because you live in America you dont have the money to do so and have to work at a store as a bag boy to make the money.
